item.title: enterprise
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Let's get your software where you need it most.

Ailur enterprise are tailored solutions for you and your team.

We offer software and support for your company, work-group, school or organization, at a flat, unchanging monthly rate, specially tailored for you and your needs.

All of our business software suite, including Burgerauth and Burgernotes, can have custom instances supported by us, maintained by us, or even hosted by us (optional).

For any business inquires or quotes, shoot us an email by clicking here and we should respond soon.

item.title: Front Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Ailur

Ailur is a open-source initiative to create a full-stack ecosystem
that is 100% open-source and 100% self-reliant

View our apps
About Us

Services

What We Offer

And all of it, totally open source

Applications

Ailur offers a vast library of fully open-source applications, free for anyone to use and customize. Simple to access, ready to deploy - at no cost whatsoever to you.

View Applications

Enterprise

Ailur delivers powerful enterprise applications tailored to your business, with full deployment, maintenance, and support on your local servers. Let us handle the tech, so you can focus on growth.

Contact us

Consulting

Ailur offers a service where you bring us your app idea, and we’ll bring it to life. We operate on a simple quote-build-pay system, ensuring a smooth process for getting your custom app built.

Get a quote

Burgernotes

Easy to use, fast to respond, and optimized for both speed and security.

Your data stays yours, on your device. We implement industry-leading encryption standards like AES-GCM and Ed25519 to ensure that only you have access to your data and no-one else - including us.

Go to Burgernotes
See the source code

Fulgens

Fulgens is an open-source HTTP server that allows for many services to be hosted in a single process, making it easy to weave services closely together. It comes with a built-in OAuth2 server to allow for easy pan-service authentication.

See the source code
Get a quote for your own instance

Our Work

Partners

Oreon Project

We are working alongside the Oreon project in order to deliver an easy-to-use desktop Linux experience, more complete than any other distro it's kind.

Visit the Oreon Website

Start Your Journey

Create your own app today

Share your app idea with us, and we’ll provide a quick and easy quote for your project.

Turn your dreams into reality today.

Get a quote

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who is Ailur?

We are a open-source initiative believing in the power of open-source software for the community, and choosing not to depend on other companies in order to provide a robust and dependable solution

Library
Contact Us

Our philosphy

Simple software is the best software

Complexity is a programmers worst enemy

Design

Everything should be simple and responsive. No-one likes a cluttered, ugly user interface or a sleek but slow and unresponsive interface. No-one likes pop-ups that show up in your face, or big brothers filling their pages with marketing.

Our goal is to make simple, responsive and beautiful interfaces, allowing you to focus on the software - not on the marketing.

Speed

Optimization is the name of the game. Quality should always be favored over speed, and we've tried to reflect that in our products. User interfaces should minimize loading bars, instead having status messages - the user deserves to know exactly how and why it's not instant.

Security

"If it works, it works" is a phrase we never want to hear. Our software is designed around ourselves, so even we cannot get at any of your data. It uses technologies like client-side encryption and Ed25519 JWT keys to ensure that your data is as secure as possible.

Start Your Journey

Create your own app today

Share your app idea with us, and we’ll provide a quick and easy quote for your project.

Turn your dreams into reality today.

Get a quote
